backend/main.mo: Main backend canister handling blob storage, access control, approvals, user profiles, file and folder metadata, and admin management utilities.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module updating stored appVersion to 0.3.88.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing high-level summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication, access control, profile setup, and conditional rendering of the file interface.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: UI screen shown to authenticated users without approval, displaying their principal ID and copy functionality.
Empty placeholder file for admin management UI.
frontend/src/components/FileList.tsx: Full file and folder browser supporting navigation, search, uploads, deletion, moving, and opening files in the preview modal.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewModal: Modal component that loads and previews various file types with navigation, fullscreen, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/FileUpload.tsx: Empty file placeholder with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing credits and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with login/logout handling, user display, theme toggle, and admin panel access.
frontend/src/components/ManagePanel.tsx: Admin panel for managing members, roles, storage stats, and removing or adding users.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for creating a user profile with username validation and uniqueness checks.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button that switches between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessBootstrap.ts: Bootstraps access control once per session and refreshes related query data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication state and login flow using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods, handling user access, profiles, files, and admin actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Exports the current application version string.
frontend/src/lib/canisterIds.ts: Retrieves backend and frontend canister IDs from multiple environment and runtime sources.
frontend/src/lib/fileLinks.ts: Generates full direct file URLs and provides a clipboard copy helper with toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/fileTypes.ts: Utility functions to detect file extensions, MIME types, and previewability.
frontend/src/lib/searchNormalize.ts: Provides Unicode-aware text normalization and substring search helpers.
frontend/src/lib/subtreeIndex.ts: Computes a set of folder IDs representing a subtree by building a parentâ€‘child index and traversing descendants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, initializing QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, goals, and feature requirements for restoring file explorer and preview behavior for release v0.3.88.
